Description: Rim fragment of North Ionian meander rim pottery plate; thin beige slip on top; maeander frieze on rim; at outside of floor black band with added red-white-red lines. Red fired bands on outside. Beige clay with few inclusions and very little mica.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.767)
